name: Sarthak
about:
Hello! I'm Sarthak, a Computer Engineering student at Pulchowk Campus, Nepal, driven by an insatiable curiosity for technology and mathematics.

I thrive on complex problem-solving challenges and am fascinated by the intersection of mathematical principles and technological innovation. My passion lies in developing elegant solutions that bridge theoretical concepts with practical applications.

My vision is to harness the transformative power of technology and mathematical modeling to create impactful solutions, particularly focusing on addressing challenges in developing communities.

Explore my portfolio to discover how I'm turning these aspirations into reality through various projects and technological explorations.
experience: Currently focused on building a strong foundation through academic projects and self-directed learning initiatives.
skills: Advanced Python/JavaScript development with focus on scalable applications
Data analysis and visualization expertise using Excel and Power BI
Extensive experience with data science stack (NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn)
Database design and optimization using SQL and NoSQL technologies
Machine learning implementation with focus on practical applications and deployment
